thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Graham
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Graham

author: Graham
title: Graham
text: I think pack send provide an excellent service. Easy to use. However I chose them based on price having grabbed a quick Quote: with the value of the goods being shipped specified. The Quote: stated that the service was an insured service, and I assumed this meant the Quote: included the insurance premium. It did not and I had already Quote: d the shipping cost to my buyer. Later in the full checkout process, the insurance premium was added on. Great service, but be aware of this.
